regular-body:
It’s always tough to say goodbye to a true original. Theyâre a rare breed. And in this day and age of the mixup and the mashup and a general trend towards homogeneity, the true original is such a precious gift. Losing one in their prime magnifies the absence.

– Jason, from the Signal vs. Noise blog

I wanted to find a nice way to mark Steve Irwin’s death â this is the best one that came up. Good night, Steve.
